projects.title: This is my first project card!
projects.description: For now, all this card data is just in a static json file. The card "VIEW" button opens /projects/[slug]. The slug is intended for the file name of the markdown file, e.g. "markdowntest.md".

projects.title: Maybe feature this website?
projects.description: Stack: SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, and possible pocketbase or a simple express/mongo backend in the future!

projects.description: Just a placeholder for future projects!
